TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Axis

summary.span: 代表图表中的单个坐标轴。

span.span: Represents a single axis in a chart.

span.para: 对象是成员集合。
使用(， ) 其中为坐标轴类型和是要返回单个坐标轴组对象。可以是以下项之一常量： ， ，或。可以是以下项之一常量：或。有关详细信息，请参阅方法。
The object is a member of the collection.

Use (, ) where is the axis type and is the axis group to return a single object. can be one of the following constants: , , or . can be one of the following constants: or . For more information, see the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Application { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 当使用对象识别符，此属性返回对象代表 Microsoft Word 应用程序。

span.span: When used without an object qualifier, this property returns an object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

summary.span: 如果使用对象识别符，此属性返回值，该值代表指定对象 （可与 OLE 自动化对象使用此属性可返回该对象的应用程序） 的创建者的对象。

span.span: When used with an object qualifier, this property returns an object that represents the creator of the specified object (you can use this property with an OLE Automation object to return the application of that object).

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AxisBetweenCategories { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果数值轴与分类轴相交于分类之间，则该属性值为 True 。

span.span: True if the value axis crosses the category axis between categories.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性仅适用于分类轴，而不适用于三维图表。
This property applies only to category axes, and it doesn't apply to 3-D charts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AxisGroup As XlAxisGroup

summary.span: 返回坐标轴组的类型。

span.span: Returns the type of axis group.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

summary.span: 返回指定坐标轴的标题。

span.span: Returns the title of the specified axis.

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlTimeUnit BaseUnit { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlTimeUnit get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlTimeUnit value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定分类轴的基本单位。

span.span: Returns or sets the base unit for the specified category axis.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 如果将此属性设置没有任何可见效果指定坐标轴属性设置为。保留设置的值，但是，而且时才生效属性设置为。
不能设置此属性对数值轴。
Setting this property has no visible effect if the property for the specified axis is set to . The set value is retained, however, and takes effect when the property is set to .
You cannot set this property for a value axis.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool BaseUnitIsAuto { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果 Microsoft Word 选择适当指定的分类轴的基本单位。

span.span: True if Microsoft Word chooses appropriate base units for the specified category axis.

summary.span: 默认值为 True 。

span.span: The default value is True.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 不能设置此属性对数值轴。
You cannot set this property for a value axis.

span.span: Returns the border of the object.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ CategoryNames { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置为文字数组的指定坐标轴中的所有类别名称。

span.span: Returns or sets all the category names for the specified axis, as a text array.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlCategoryType CategoryType { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlCategoryType get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlCategoryType value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置分类轴类型。

span.span: Returns or sets the category axis type.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 不能设置此属性对数值轴。
You cannot set this property for a value axis.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 如果对象在 Microsoft Word 中，创建属性返回十六进制数字 4d535744，表示的字符串"MSWD。" 此属性主要旨在用于的 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Word 具有 MSWD 的创建者代码。有关此属性的其他信息，请咨询的语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition 中包含的帮助。

If the object was created in Microsoft Word, the property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlAxisCrosses Crosses { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlAxisCrosses get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlAxisCrosses value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定坐标轴与其他坐标轴相交的点。

span.span: Returns or sets the point on the specified axis where the other axis crosses.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 此属性不可用于雷达图。对于三维图表，此属性只能应用于数值轴且指示平面定义由分类轴与数值轴相交的位置。
此属性可用于分类和数值轴。分类轴上,设置数值轴上的第一个类别，跨和设置数值轴的最后一个类别处相交。
注意和可以具有不同的含义，根据坐标轴。
This property isn't available for radar charts. For 3-D charts, this property can only be applied to the value axis and indicates where the plane defined by the category axes crosses the value axis.
This property can be used for both category and value axes. On the category axis, sets the value axis to cross at the first category, and sets the value axis to cross at the last category.
Note that and can have different meanings, depending on the axis.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double CrossesAt { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置数值轴中与分类坐标轴的交点。

span.span: Returns or sets the point on the value axis where the category axis crosses it.

summary.span: 仅应用于数值轴。

span.span: Applies only to the value axis.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 设置此属性将导致属性更改为。
此属性不能用于雷达图。对于三维图表，该属性指示定义由分类轴的平面的数值坐标轴交点。
Setting this property causes the property to change to .
This property cannot be used on radar charts. For 3-D charts, this property indicates where the plane defined by the category axes crosses the value axis.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Delete() runtime managed

summary.span: 删除对象。

span.span: Deletes the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlDisplayUnit DisplayUnit { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlDisplayUnit get(); void set(Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::XlDisplayUnit value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置数值轴的单位标签。

span.span: Returns or sets the unit label for the value axis.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 当图表大值，则使用单位标签使刻度线标志更容易阅读。例如，如果您标记将数值轴的单位百、 成千上万，您可以使用较小的数值轴上的刻度。

Using unit labels when charting large values makes your tick mark labels easier to read. For example, if you label your value axis in units of hundreds, thousands, or millions, you can use smaller numeric values at the tick marks on the axis.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double DisplayUnitCustom { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 如果值属性是，键入属性返回或设置的显示单位的值。

span.span: If the value of the property is , the property returns or sets the value of the displayed units.

summary.span: 值必须介于 0 到 10e307 之间。

span.span: The value must be from 0 through 10E307.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 当图表大值，则使用单位标签使刻度线标志更容易阅读。例如，如果您标记将数值轴的单位百、 成千上万，您可以使用较小的数值轴上的刻度。

Using unit labels when charting large values makes your tick mark labels easier to read. For example, if you label your value axis in units of hundreds, thousands, or millions, you can use smaller numeric values at the tick marks on the axis.

summary.span: 如果返回Nothing属性设置为False。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasTitle { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果坐标轴或图表有可见标题，则该属性值为 True 。

An axis title is represented by an object.

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 试图将该属性设置一个值小于或等于零 (0) 会导致错误。默认值为 10。
Attempting to set this property to a value less than or equal to zero (0) causes an error. The default value is 10.
